title: the truth about going home for the holidays
itunes:title: the truth about going home for the holidays
description:
Join Brooke and Danielle as they debrief on their week apart for Thanksgiving!  The gals get into family dynamics, boundaries, dealing with emotions and more topics related to visiting home for the holidays.  Listen in to hear the gals best tips for navigating these tough situations! Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies/stories on Instagram! 


SHOP GOTG MERCH! https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go 



Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/ 

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio 
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/ 

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan 
Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/
